overview: Luscious Digital Playground superstarlet Selena Rose signs up for one-on-one boxing lessons from James Deen. Odd Jobs movie What she doesn't know is that her 'coach' is a fake! James and his buddies are broke, out of work losers who happened to score some old athletic equipment. To make some beer money the guys pass themselves off a certified professionals.
tagline: Making Money And Getting Laid, Any Way Possible!
title: Odd Jobs
